name: Tank Wars (itch) (liamhamilton)
description:
Welcome to Tank Wars.

This game is about fighting the enemy tank while trying to protect yourself and trying to get the most amount of kills on the tank. You also have the option to find your high scores after you win / lose a game. just click the high scores button on the bottom right to see them!

Features

  • High scores
  • decorations and objects to help block other tanks'  bullets
  • a movable turret to adjust where to move the bullets(this is controlled by the mouse moving) 

  Controls

Return key - start game

WASD / Arrow keys- move around

Click - shoot

Contact

Gmail: liamhamiltontanks@gmail.com
